## Description
A clear and concise description of the feature or idea you'd like to see.

## Use Case
Describe the problem or use case this feature would solve. Why is this feature needed?

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternatives Considered
Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Additional Context
Add any other context, examples, or mockups about the feature request here.
